mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sicdan (sic_num, sic_title, user_id, content) VALUES (sicdan_seq.nextval, #{sic_title}, #{user_id}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT sic_num, sic_title, user_id, content, TO_CHAR(writeday, 'yyyy/MM/dd') AS writeday, readCnt, is_del FROM sicdan WHERE sic_num = #{sic_num} AND is_del = 'N'

SELECT sic_num, sic_title, user_id, content, TO_CHAR(writeday, 'yyyy/MM/dd') AS writeday, readCnt FROM sicdan WHERE is_del = 'N'
AND sic_title LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND user_id LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
ORDER BY sic_num DESC

SELECT count(*) FROM sicdan
WHERE LOWER(sic_title) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{searchValue}) || '%'
